description:
Are you reluctant to speak up? Are you missing out on the chance to resolve interpersonal challenges because you’re afraid to deal with conflict?

People who don’t master the art of assertive communication can slow or even derail a successful career. Those who know how to express themselves deal more confidently and much more effectively with people and situations.

This course walks you through the six secrets of Assertive Communication:

  • Secret #1 – The Word Defined
    • Secret #2 – The Look Revealed
    • Secret #3 – The Tough Talks
    • Secret #4 – The Emotional Equation
    • Secret #5 – The Communication Rule
    • Secret #6 – The Considerate Connection

    • You will also learn to:

  • Be clear on what you want and articulate it.
    • Understand body language.
    • Learn to say “no” with tact.
    • Effectively negotiate win/win solutions.
title: Assertive Communication: Get What You Want!
